# Invite a User

**Web Service Endpoint**

Invite a user with assigned user roles to join your team.

## Sending and Canceling Invitations

- **Cancel a User Invitation**: Cancel a pending invitation for a user to join your team.

items.description: Cancel a pending invitation for a user to join your team.
items.name: Cancel a User Invitation
